website_summaries.verdict: Telltale Games crafted a charming adventure packed with likable characters and a gripping story that Minecraft fans will truly enjoy.
pros: Easy for all ages to enjoy
New way to experience the Minecraft world
Available for Xbox One, PS4, Nintendo Switch, PC, Google Play, etc
cons: Once you’ve played through the story, there are few reasons to replay it

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed with the CD while Amazon is Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good game but the CD they are sending is defective. First CD was bad. I had to return it. Amazon was amazing. They promptly sent me a replacement CD. But the second CD didn't work either. Also, title is very misleading. It says it includes all 8 episodes but it doesn't. It says, can't recognize the CD. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pal

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Creative
customer_reviews.text: Minecraft is a fun and creative game without the excessive violence that many other games have. This version is fun because it kickstarts the creativity for the kids and introduces them to some things they may not figure out on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Scott and Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Includes all episodes- condition as described
customer_reviews.text: Includes all the episodes - exactly what my son wanted. Great condition and as desribed.
customer_reviews.author: A_Hall

customer_reviews.title: Not a 2 player game
customer_reviews.text: Great game thought the kids would love this until...we found out it's not 2 player unless you're online. So now the kids fight over it and it just doesn't get played. That was my fault but now y'all know...its not 2 player.
customer_reviews.author: Ap

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far no complaints from my daughter. And believe me. She is hard to please when buying presents for. Got to be what she likes.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry NAFC

customer_reviews.title: Great for MInecraft lovers while encouraging reading!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 9 year old son because it encourages him to read. He loves the game and requires a little help with some of the words, but overall can play the game alone.
customer_reviews.author: victorian_angel

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for younger children
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for 1 of my grandsons. He enjoys it. This game is geared for younger children minus the guts & blood that are so popular .
customer_reviews.author: Cathy M.

customer_reviews.title: Just a great game of for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: Just a great game of for kids and adults. I think the choices are fun and fun to see what the kids choose. It feels like your in control of the whole thing. I am impressed with all of the options.
customer_reviews.author: Momwith2boys

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift did not work. Amazon says too late to return.
customer_reviews.text: It does not play. I bought it in October as a Christmas gift for my daughter. She opened it on Christmas day and it did not work at all. Amazon says it is too late to return it. I had to return it by November 25th. How could I do that with a Christmas gift??? This is very disappointing. I am a very loyal Amazon Prime customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rip off!
customer_reviews.text: My son watched the first 3 episodes. He was so excited to watch the rest. The next day the game is asking for $30 to watch the rest. What a disappointment! Not impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Not your typical Minecraft
customer_reviews.text: Just a warning, this isn't the typical Minecraft that is so popular with kids and adults. My son liked this story mode version of Minecraft, but he prefers the original.
customer_reviews.author: k k

customer_reviews.title: All 8 episodes
customer_reviews.text: My disc came with all 8 episodes was worried after some reviews said they didn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome macline 69

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Unusable.
customer_reviews.text: The company fails to tell you that you cannot play the entire game bc it will not download. Dont expect help from sellr
customer_reviews.author: word

customer_reviews.title: Accessing the other episodes
customer_reviews.text: If you have a problem accessing all the episodes try uninstalling a previous Minecraft story mode that you may have downloaded before you purchased this disk. That worked for me. You also have to finish episode 1 on your new disc to get to episode 2.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Cymny

customer_reviews.title: Half of DLC not available
customer_reviews.text: We went to download the DLC for this title after setting up a new xbox for the kids only to discover that about half of the DLC content is no longer available. This makes the game very short and you cannot finish the story.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dun

customer_reviews.title: This product worked
customer_reviews.text: I was able to download all the episodes and kids are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Foote family

customer_reviews.title: Obviously a great game, as I cannot get my kids away ...
customer_reviews.text: Obviously a great game, as I cannot get my kids away from it...just one more minute is a common phrase you will hear when requesting the Xbox to be turned off when this game is in play.
customer_reviews.author: L. Fagan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great item, my 8 year old boy loved it, but completed by the time the Christmas holiday's was over!
customer_reviews.author: Titan Brave

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: My you get kids liked it but my oldest said it wasn't interactive enough and they went through all 8 episodes like binge watching a tv series on Amazon 😂.
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Only one episode on the disc.
customer_reviews.text: I guess I didn't research carefully enough. I thought I was purchasing all the episodes on disc. Only episode 1 was on it. Shipping was prompt though.
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: A different kind of 'game'
customer_reviews.text: The kids and I have enjoyed following the story. I like the interactive storytelling - the choices you make change details within the storyline without fundamentally changing the story. So far...
customer_reviews.author: Andy Skelley

customer_reviews.title: My son loved this game and plowed straight through it
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this game and plowed straight through it. Now I am looking for the next one in the series. Great game.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Just redirects you to Microsoft store
customer_reviews.text: So bought this thibking it would bypass the servers no longer being active. It does not.. it just redirects you to the Microsoft store to download them. So.. its a coaster now. :(
customer_reviews.author: bristel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves the story that goes with the game. More interactive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not appropriate for little ones.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8yo but didn't realize there was cussing. Wish I could return now... :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but Iknow better.
customer_reviews.text: Nephew loves minecraft, he claims to havw completed the game, but Iknow better.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Arrieta

customer_reviews.title: Kid couldn't stop playing
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this game and couldn't stop playing it!! When she finally finished she just started again. Gotta say as a parent it was pretty interesting.
customer_reviews.author: T'senia Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very fun game and it’s a fun way to pass time. Really fun and I really enjoyed what Mojang and Telltales did with the story and the direction it takes throughout the episodes
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Contain All Seasons
customer_reviews.text: We bought this game specifically because it says seasons 1-8. However, you can only access seasons 1-4. My son is VERY disappointed that he can't play 5-8 even though they should have been on the disk!
customer_reviews.author: Megan R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: God son loves this game. Very kid friendly (he is 10).
customer_reviews.author: Gus Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looking for your kid to enjoy reading? This is it! Love it~
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Received on time and thorougly packaged.
customer_reviews.text: Product was brand new and when my grandson played the game, it worked perfectly. My grandson is 9 years old and loved this game. I would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: C Grosskopf

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be a hit with 7 and 12 yr old.
customer_reviews.text: I played this a bit and found it entertaining. My kids, ages 7 and 12 really like it. The text choices go a little fast for the 7 yr old but she's getting the hang of it. The stories can change somewhat based on the decisions the player makes so they can actually be played through more than once. Our kids are limited to only playing on non-school eve/days and then only for a few hours. This game has been getting consistent play during part of their "video time" so that indicates to me that it's got their attention over some of the other games.
customer_reviews.author: TBigATC

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the game! Great purchase. Packaging was great. Arrived with no trouble!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrill

customer_reviews.title: wouldn't recommend since they don't curse but do use some inappropriate ...
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying this for kids, younger than 15 or 16, wouldn't recommend since they don't curse but do use some inappropriate language for young kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How do you access the additional episodes..........?
customer_reviews.text: My son only asked for 2 things this year; Xbox and Minecraft Story Mode. He got both but has only been able to play 1 of the 8 episodes in the game! Episodes 1 through 5 are "purchased, coming soon"! How do I get these other episodes, and how long does he have to wait? He's played episode 1 three times already. I can't stand the hurt and disappointment over a gift he can't use!
customer_reviews.author: Kay in Philadelphia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boy loves this game. So does my five year old girl
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: More play time needed.
customer_reviews.text: This game is a little short. I wish it lasted longer than it did.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This order came in on time and they kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Does Not Come with all the episodes despite it saying episodes 1-8 waste of money. My son already had it on his kindle but I thought it would be fun to have it on Xbox too. Now I have to spend the money all all the episodes such crap
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter and she completed chapter one. Went to play chapter 2 and is now asking to purchase the remaining chapters. What the heck?! Why would I buy story mode if the whole item wasn't there!! Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: It's my 9 year old favorite game.
customer_reviews.text: It's my 9 year old favorite game ..and they told me it was gonna come on the 28th but it was here before Christmas...thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could do without the bad language, especially for young kids.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy about this game. Bought it to be Christmas gift for our son. Seems a little dull and limited. Especially can't understand why bad language & negative language about other characters was put in the game, knowing that SO MANY YOUNG CHILDREN (as young as 5 yrs old) love Minecraft. For example, numerous times we heard phrases that included: "What the Hell?!!" & "...freaking <insert word here>" & "F-bomb" & on & on. When my husband & I heard all this, we were like, "What?! Really??? That is SO UNNECESSARY!" Great, now Minecraft is adding more garbage to our kids minds. Garbage in, Garbage out... Not happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: M.L.E.93

customer_reviews.title: Kids liked it a lot. Moved too slow for me (parent).
customer_reviews.text: Mincecraft: Story Mode - Xbox One Kids really liked it. They are 8 and 10 years old. The story was interesting but so slow I couldn't personally handle it so I'd go do something else. Of course I'm not the target audience either. Interesting that you can pick your own character (out of 4) and make some different decisions that the game remembers and changes things up just a bit. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Customer-Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my daughters!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters (12 years) LOVE this! They have played it for hours already and I love hearing how much fun they are having with it. I'm not sure if they will replay it once they get to the end, but even if they don't, it was well worth the money and one of the best video games we have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kat NV

customer_reviews.title: My 8 year old son enjoys this game very much ...
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son enjoys this game very much, and the decision making process encourages him to work on his reading skills because the decisions require faster reading in order to understand all of the choices.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. I read in the Q&A (before purchasing) that this game included the baseline Minecraft engine (game?). It does not. These 'story mode' games play like a soap-opera. There is no capability to play the simple Minecraft game from this CD.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Morgan

customer_reviews.title: My 9 year old grandson was thrilled to receive this ...
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old grandson was thrilled to receive this for his birthday, Not a gamer myself I cannot tell you how to play but can attest to his amazement at playing it for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Not happy this can only be played on Xbox live
customer_reviews.text: Not happy this can only be played on Xbox live. I don't want my kids on Xbox live. What ever happened to just simple games not requiring young children on the Internet for everything?
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old really enjoys this game. The stories are interesting and entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Jai JJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my daughter (8 yrs old) has loved this game and we've had a great time playing it together.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Honestly disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: As far as RPG games go this is one of the most basic, action sequences are minimal and are not challenging in the least. Honestly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Ross

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandson thought it was great, especially with the character included!
customer_reviews.author: bec

customer_reviews.title: kids love it but if you have to pay for every ...
customer_reviews.text: kids love it but if you have to pay for every episode then its too much money ! it's like an $80 game ... warning ....
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Got a replace game and it still does not work.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves Minecraft Story Mode, has already completed all the adventures

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged to my nephews house. Had to return it

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Only one person can play at the time. Language is awful
customer_reviews.author: Customer HG

customer_reviews.title: Don't have much to say. It's a gift for ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't have much to say. It's a gift for my son. He really wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: I am sure he loved it.
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my grandson which I mailed. I am sure he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: BT

customer_reviews.title: Him and his younger brothers loved the game and the story mode
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited to receive this for his 8th birthday! Him and his younger brothers loved the game and the story mode!

customer_reviews.title: this Game is a waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my kids since they wanted to build things....this Game is a waste of time....there is no actual building

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money..
customer_reviews.text: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY. I BOUGHT FOR MY SON AND AFTER EPISODE 1 U HAVE TO PAY $4.99 FOR EACH EPISODE (THERES 1-8 EPISODES) EVEN THO IT STATES IT INCLUDES EPISODE (1-8) IT DOESN'T . BECARFUL ..
customer_reviews.author: Deedee Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good comedy.
customer_reviews.text: I last watched this movie 25-30 years ago. I bought it for my teenage son and watched it with him. Though he didn't get the Howard Cosell jokes, he seemed to love the movie. I know I did.
customer_reviews.author: The Cat from Outer Space

product_meta.title: Minecraft: Story Mode- The Complete Adventure - Xbox One
product_meta.description: BE THE HERO OF A GRAND ADVENTURE IN THE MINECRAFT UNIVERSE! Embark on a perilous quest across the Over world, to the End, and beyond. While at EnderCon in hopes of meeting Gabriel the Warrior, you and your friends discover that something is wrong. something dreadful. Terror is unleashed, and you must set out on a quest to find The Order of the Stone if you are to save your world from oblivion. With a team of friends at your side, and a troubled land in need of heroes, your decisions - what you say and do - drive the story around you, so choose wisely!
feature_bullets: Created by award-winning adventure game powerhouse Telltale Games, in partnership with Minecraft creators, Mojang
You will drive the story through the decisions you make: what you say to people (and how you say it), and what you choose to do in moments of thrilling action will make this YOUR story
All eight episodes in the series on one disc for the first time, all five episodes of Season One and all three episodes of the Adventure Pass.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars390 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
